name: Shaun Tan
what_you_do: Daily CMO is a platform that provides daily insights and lessons on marketing and business growth, featuring content from marketing professionals and business owners.
who_you_serve: Daily CMO serves marketers and business owners, primarily in Malaysia, who are looking to improve their marketing strategies and connect with like-minded individuals.
signature_programs: members-only case studies, bi-weekly marketing deep-dive sessions
service_provided: case studies, community engagement, online sessions, events
current_projects: Underdog Con marketing conference, paid membership program
business_focus: Daily CMO is a platform that provides daily insights and lessons on marketing and business growth, featuring content from marketing professionals and business owners.
